IssueTable.Subject: Truck Broke Down
IssueTable.Comment: Agent has a truck that is broken down and the service department is unable to repair it. Deliveries will be affected.

IssueTable.Subject: Address Change
IssueTable.Comment: Billing address changed; please contact HO.

IssueTable.Subject: Driver Sick
IssueTable.Comment: Due to high volume and drivers sick/hurt we are not going to be able to deliver today

IssueTable.Subject: Cannot Take Friday Delivery
IssueTable.Comment: Chris called in from the restaraunt, stated they cannot take thier Friday delivery; stated they can take it on Tuesday.

IssueTable.Subject: Carton Shortage
IssueTable.Comment: Please advise when the carton# 1002348764 will be delivered.

IssueTable.Subject: Linehaul Delayed
IssueTable.Comment: Thursday's freight will not be delivered due to heavy traffic. This freight will be delivered on Friday.

IssueTable.Subject: Refusing Shipment
IssueTable.Comment: Store is refusing the delivery. It is large and they need to accept it. Driver is waiting; please advise
